textHome: I'm a web developer creating websites for businesses and individuals. I transform ideas into digital solutions that grab attention and provide value.

aboutDetails.textAbout: I am a web developer with a passion for creating engaging and intuitive digital experiences. With over three years of experience, I specialise in building modern, responsive interfaces using technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Express, and WordPress.

I have had the opportunity to collaborate on various projects, helping transform ideas into robust and functional digital solutions. One of my notable projects is the Author Notation Generator, where I utilised the Cutter table as a foundation. Currently, I am developing a similar application using PHA tables with JavaScript, aiming to optimise processes and provide innovative solutions in the field of Library and Information Science.

experience.text: With over 3 years of experience in web development, working with various clients and projects.

education.title: Education
education.text: I have a degree in Computer Science from the University of São Paulo, specialising in web development and design.

projeto1.title: Self-Portrait Project
projeto1.description: The Self-Portrait Project, developed for the Rede de Desenvolvimento Quilombola Eparrei, aims to train 60 young quilombolas in the production of experimental photography. I developed the website using React JS for the interface, Styled Components for the responsive design, and Vercel storage for content storage and hosting. The project addressed a real demand, delivering a functional, scalable solution that aligned with the needs of the initiative.
